text: Lagenandra dewitii is a plant in the Araceae family. It was first described for science in 1986 from living plants and dried herbarium material. It is named in honour of the Dutch botanist Hendrik de Wit. ==Where it grows== The plant is found only in Sri Lanka. ==References== ==Other websites== * Isotype in Kew Herbarium * Isotype in Herbarium Berolinense Category:Araceae
title: Lagenandra dewitii
